meanings.sent1: The engorged mosquito had just finished feeding on blood.
meanings.sent2: The engorged tick was removed carefully to avoid infection.
meanings.sent3: The engorged balloon popped with a loud bang, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks were as engorged as ripe apples, flushed with embarrassment.
meanings.sent5: The engorged river burst its banks, flooding the nearby fields.

meanings.sent1: The engorged suitcase barely closed with all the clothes inside.
meanings.sent2: The engorged clouds signaled an impending storm.
meanings.sent3: The engorged jar of cookies tempted him with its sweet aroma.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt as engorged with love as a blooming flower.
meanings.sent5: The engorged trash bin attracted scavenging raccoons in the night.

meanings.sent1: The engorged storage room was difficult to navigate with boxes everywhere.
meanings.sent2: The engorged inbox of emails awaited her attention.
meanings.sent3: The engorged buffet table groaned under the weight of delicious food.
meanings.sent4: His mind felt as engorged with information as an encyclopedia.
